deleteQuestion.zero: Are you sure you want to delete '${board.name}' board?
deleteQuestion.singular: Are you sure you want to delete '${board.name}' board? There is 1 card. All data will be removed.
deleteQuestion.plural: Are you sure you want to delete '${board.name}' board? There are ${count} cards. All data will be removed.

attachments.name: Attachments
attachments.restrictions: Only PNG and JPG image formats are permitted, and file sizes must not exceed 4.5 MB.
attachments.dropZoneMessage: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files

uploadError.singular: The file failed to upload due to format or size restrictions.
uploadError.plural: ${count} files failed to upload due to format or size restrictions.
